name: Caught by the Wind
description:
Made in 3 hours for the Tri-Jam 123 with the them hide or get caught, the game fits the theme because I was more focused on the caught part and you are caught by the wind. I love making little prototypes with fun mechanics like this so you might see me here again.

Might update post-jam with more levels, maybe mechanics, and a better menu.

*Can be played on mobile*

Controls:

  • Move with mouse
  • R to restart
  • Click to play

Assets:

  • SFX: 200 Free SFX
  • Song: FREE Music Loop Bundle
  • Font: Free Pixel Font - ThaleahFat
